qas.question: Who was the true backer of the cause of affirmative action?
What position of power did Harold L. Ickes hold?
The first introduction of a quota system mandated that contractors had to do what?

answers.text: employ a fixed percentage of Black workers

qas.question: Which piece of legislation prevented any discrimination in the defense industry and government?
What does the FEPC stand for?
Who was the true backer of the cause of non-affirmative action?
What position of power did Clark L. Ickes hold?

plausible_answers.text: employ a fixed percentage of Black workers

qas.question: The first introduction of a quota system mandated that contractors can't do what?
Which piece of legislation didn't prevent any discrimination in the defense industry and government?
What does the FPPC stand for?

context: FDR's New Deal programs often contained equal opportunity clauses stating "no discrimination shall be made on account of race, color or creed",:11 but the true forerunner to affirmative action was the <a1_0><b6_0>Interior Secretary<b6_0/><a1_0/> of the time, <a0_0><b5_0>Harold L. Ickes<b5_0/><a0_0/>. Ickes prohibited discrimination in hiring for Public Works Administration funded projects and oversaw not only the institution of a quota system, where contractors were required to <a2_0><b7_0>employ a fixed percentage of Black workers<b7_0/><a2_0/>, by Robert C. Weaver and Clark Foreman,:12 but also the equal pay of women proposed by Harry Hopkins.:14FDR's largest contribution to affirmative action, however, lay in his <a3_0><b8_0>Executive Order 8802<b8_0/><a3_0/> which prohibited discrimination in the defense industry or government.:22 The executive order promoted the idea that if taxpayer funds were accepted through a government contract, then all taxpayers should have an equal opportunity to work through the contractor.:23–4 To enforce this idea, Roosevelt created the <a4_0><b9_0>Fair Employment Practices Committee<b9_0/><a4_0/> (FEPC) with the power to investigate hiring practices by government contractors.:22
